original_title: Myrtle Simpson: A Life on Ice
overview: Myrtle Simpson was awarded the Polar Medal over fifty years after she became the first woman to cross the polar ice cap covering Greenland. Myrtleâ€™s life has taken her around the globe blazing her own, unique trail and today, at 90, she continues to explore the world around her.
title: Myrtle Simpson: A Life on Ice
